event_data.description: Tenant reports water leak under kitchen sink. Water is pooling on the floor and dripping from the cabinet. Issue started this morning. Urgent repair needed.

data.selection_reason: Best match for plumbing repair type, available for urgent requests

emails.content:
Subject: Maintenance Request Summary - Unit 204

Dear Property Manager,

A new maintenance request has been received and processed:

Property/Unit: Unit 204 - 123 Main Street
Event Type: maintenance_request
Repair Type: plumbing
Urgency: urgent

Description:
Tenant reports water leak under kitchen sink. Water is pooling on the floor and dripping from the cabinet. Issue started this morning. Urgent repair needed.

Actions Taken:
- Repair type determined: plumbing
- Maintenance company selected: ABC Plumbing Services
- Emails generated and ready for review

Please review the case file for complete details.

Best regards,
Property Management Agent

Subject: Maintenance Request - Unit 204 - Urgent Plumbing Issue

Dear ABC Plumbing Services,

We have an urgent maintenance request that requires your attention:

Property/Unit: Unit 204 - 123 Main Street
Repair Type: plumbing
Urgency: urgent

Issue Description:
Tenant reports water leak under kitchen sink. Water is pooling on the floor and dripping from the cabinet. Issue started this morning. Urgent repair needed.

We would appreciate if you could provide your available times to come inspect this issue and provide a consultation. Please respond with your availability so we can coordinate with the tenant.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.

Best regards,
Property Management Team

Subject: Maintenance Request Received - Unit 204

Dear Tenant,

Thank you for reporting the maintenance issue at Unit 204 - 123 Main Street.

We have received your request regarding the plumbing issue (water leak under kitchen sink) and have taken immediate action. A maintenance company (ABC Plumbing Services) will be contacting you shortly to schedule a time to visit and assess the issue.

Please be available to coordinate with the maintenance company for the inspection. They will work with you to find a convenient time for the visit.

If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us.

Thank you for your patience.

Best regards,
Property Management Team
